title: Python + Geographic Data = BFFs
summary:
Python is so well-suited for processing and managing geographic data, I
think they'll be best friends forever. In this talk, I'll introduce some
of the best Python libraries to use with your geodata, and show you how
treating GeoJSON like a Python dictionary can make cleaning and
validating your data a breeze. I'll also discuss examples of using
Python to add custom functionality to GIS software.
